definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
to recommend sb/to give a referral
Mao Sui recommends himself (idiom); to offer one's services (in the style of Mao Sui offering his services to king of Chu 楚 of the Warring states)
to propose (for a job)/to nominate/to recommend
Qi Xi's recommendation (idiom); recommending the best person for the job independent of factional loyalty
court crown beneath straw shoe (idiom); everything turned upside down
sacrum (bone at the base of the spine)

sentences.english: So, I'll give a lecture titled《I Commend My Heart to the Lofty Thill》.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，我作如下演講，題目是《我以我心薦軒轅》。

sentences.english: It is an important part of library reading tutorship work to recommend readers to read poems and articles.
sentences.chinese: 詩文薦讀是圖書館閱讀輔導工作的重要內容之一。

sentences.english: to every man's conscience in the sight of God.
sentences.chinese: 好在神面前把自己薦與各人的良心。

definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
to introduce (sb to sb)/to give a presentation/to present (sb for a job etc)/introduction
